track.name: The 2nd Law: Isolated System
comments: Wish it could have less talking, this track is almost perfect.
Didn't really like the album but this is stunning. I have goosebumps as I'm writing this.
This song worked so well in World War Z.
Soothing.
Overused by World War Z

la manera de como metieron la canción en World War Z le da un plus a la película 

:D
one of the most underrated tracks ever...
Unsustainable is like civilization coming to an end and isolated system is like the aftermath
The way they managed to weave this all throughout World War Z is just too perfect, giving the movie extra layer of panic and tension
Brilliant, but reminds me a lot of Seconds by Hope of the States...
Best on the album. By far
Yeah, you can totally see the stars collapsing, the space imploding... the whole universe coming to an end. Thrilling song, huh? Keeps you waiting for a climax, but it never peaks... love it : P
it feels like I'm watching the universe destroying itself and in the end.... there's no end... there's nothing.... but me
so powerful, glorious, but creepy and teriifying at the same time '-' sounds like an universal collapse
Beyond beautiful. [3]
Best track on The 2nd Law.
Beyond beautiful. [2]
So Dr. Who! [3]
this song makes me feel feels
Take that back. This song is absolutely brilliant after the talking stops.
